amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any person convicted of crimes of domestic violence as defined by the Violence Against Women Act from sponsoring the visa application of a foreigner.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-236 to prohibit a person convicted of domestic violence from sponsoring a visa applicant in the future.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
